name: Skrimples
description: What is the project about? Skrimples is a decentralized protocol that is building smart contracts on Shibarium for staking $SHIB based assets. What makes your project unique? Skrimples unique value proposition is derived from unlocking value for the Shibarium ecosystem through various smart contracts. History of your project. Skrimples was initially conceived when a group came together that wanted to build on the Shibarium ecosystem. Somewhere during March 2023, Skrimples secured validator access to Shibarium. What’s next for your project? In the future, Skrimples plans to expand its smart contracts to include various launched and to be launched assets on Shibarium. What can your token be used for? Skrimples $SKRIMP token is intended to be backed by $BONE to maintain it’s value. Moreover, the token is taxable, meaning that trades will fill treasury for various activities. At a later stage, $SKRIMP will have other utilities.
